author: Cedric Canard
content: I too like these sorts of images that show multi layers of life in the one scene. I recently captured a swag of them though I agree, they are easy to miss as we tend to shut out the layers when we look at reflections and concentrate only on the most prominent image. As you say, that is a remnant of our early need for survival. Which I might add, is still relevant today I am sure ðŸ™‚
